LanguageData.Dirt.label: 土堆
LanguageData.Dirt.description: Simple soil dug out of the ground.
LanguageData.Sand.label: 沙
LanguageData.Sand.description: Sand can be crushed from Rubble or gathered from the ground. It is a necessary ingredient in making Glass Batch and Silicon.
LanguageData.CrushedStone.label: 碎石
LanguageData.CrushedStone.description: Rough Rubble stones are created by smashing stone chunks or blocks. It can be gathered from gravel on the ground. It is a useful ingredient for concrete. It can also be smashed further to produce Sand.
LanguageData.Compost.label: 堆肥
LanguageData.Compost.description: A mix of food wastes. Rather disgusting, but useful if you want to make fertilizer.
LanguageData.Fertilizer.label: 肥料
LanguageData.Fertilizer.description: Fertilizer enhances soil to speed the growth of plants.
LanguageData.RottedMeat.label: 腐烂的肉
LanguageData.RottedMeat.description: This apparently used to be meat of some sort, but now it's just a disgusting pile of rotted mush. Useful for making compost, perhaps, but not for much else.
LanguageData.RottedMush.label: 腐烂物质
LanguageData.RottedMush.description: Whatever this used to be, it's now just a disgusting pile of rotted mush. Useful for making compost, perhaps, but not for much else.
